c:
\frac{\partial \overline{f}}{\partial x}(z) 
  = 
  \frac{1}{i}\frac{\partial \overline{f}}{\partial y}(z), \; \mbox{ or }
  d \overline{f}_z(i) = i \times d \overline{f}_z(1)

\frac{\partial \overline{f}}{\partial x}(z) 
  = 
  d (c \circ f)_z (1) 
  =
  (c \circ df_z)(1)
  =
  \overline{\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}}

\frac{\partial \overline{f}}{\partial y}(z) 
  = 
  d (c \circ f)_z (i) 
  =
  (c \circ df_z)(i)
  =
  \overline{\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}},

\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}(z) 
  = 
  -\frac{1}{i}\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}(z), \; \mbox{ or }
  d f_z(i) = -i \times d f_z(1).

d(f \circ g)_z
    =d(c \circ \overline{f})_{c(\overline{g}(z))} \circ d(c \circ  \overline{g})_z
    = c \circ d\overline{f}_{c(\overline{g}(z))} \circ c \circ d\overline{g}_z.
c(h w) = \overline{h} c(w), \;d\overline{g}_z(h w) = h d\overline{g}(w), \; d\overline{f}_{c(\overline{g}(z))}(h w) = h d\overline{f}_{c(\overline{g}(z))}(w),
g = c \circ f \circ c = (c \circ f) \circ c

\arg (x + i y) = 
  \left| 
  \begin{array}{cl}
  \arctan y/x & \mbox{if } x > 0, \\
  +\pi/2 - \arctan x/y & \mbox{if } y > 0, \\
  -\pi/2 - \arctan x/y & \mbox{if } y < 0. \\
  \end{array}
  \right.

\ell_{\alpha} 
  = 
  \frac{1}{2}
  \left(
    \frac{\partial f}{\partial x}(z_0)
    +
    \frac{1}{i}\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}(z_0)
  \right)
    +
  \frac{1}{2}
  \left(
    \frac{\partial f}{\partial x}(z_0)
    - 
    \frac{1}{i}\frac{\partial f}{\partial y}(z_0)
  \right)e^{-i2\alpha}.
